name: Neon Erasure
description:
Test your skills in this fast-paced, physics based platformer! But be careful, everywhere you go you erase the level! Try not to get lost in the neon void.

Made In GMS2 For The "Amaze Me Game Jam"

Controls:

  • Left & Right Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • R - Restart Level
  • Esc - Exit To Menu
